name: Spartans Vs Zombies Defense
description: In this tug-of-war, casual defense game， you play Leonidas who is the hero-king of Sparta, against hordes of attacking zombies in Thermopylae. Recruit allies and build defenses to stop them!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Dual-Core 1.5 GHz / AMD Dual-Core Athlon 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: SM 3.0 with 512MB VRAM; NVIDIA Storage: 1 GB available space

reviews.review_text: Spartans Vs Copyright Infringement Defence
This really is an iOS game. Please, please Steam stop smoking the apple market's junk and get some chemo for this cancer you have. Thanks.

At first in English. Más abajo en argento bien piola (?)  So, I was bored and I saw that piece of ♥♥♥♥ in the popular new releases list. I played for 5 minutes, I guess and my question is: Why is there a mobile app on Steam?  I hated it because I can't use the keyboard to play. You must use right click to walk and you can only walk. Oh, and you can't fight the enemies from their backs. Upgradation part I think it is okay. It's a shame because I like RPG old school but that is horrible.  ---------  Estaba aburrida y vi esta ♥♥♥♥♥♥ en la lista de nuevos lanzamientos populares. Creo que jugué por 5 minutos, y ahora me pregunto: ¿Por qué hay una aplicación de celular en Steam?  Odié que sólo fuera click derecho y no pudiera usar el teclado. Sólo podés caminar y encima no podés pegarles por la espalda. La parte de mejoras creo que está bien. Es una lástima porque me gustan los RPG al viejo estilo pero este está del carajo.
This 'game' gave me cancer.
Hilariously bad in every aspect.
MADNESS?! No... It's just a crappy mobile game.
This game is ♥♥♥♥
A cheap cash-in with similar gameplay to Plants vs Zombies; however, this has many stolen assets and is poorly translated. How the reviews are mixed and not negative is beyond me.

This is an absolute insult to real game designers. In fact, this thing got through Greenlight and Steam does not check its products. For all the games on sale, there are bad ones. Devoted of strategy aspects, microtransactions that don't work at all, copyright infringement, bad mobile port, lazy mechanics... I would pay 2$ for Plants vs. Zombies and more so I can give them to my friends so they can enjoy a good game. This is nonsensical.

This another revamped review.   This is 'game' clearly has violated the copyright laws. They just put together stuff from the movie 300, and from other tug of war games and cram it all into this mess of a game.  Not only does this game offer microtransaction but it doesn't even work, the options menu are simplistic and they can't even get the font size of the title right with any kind of resolution.  This is clearly the most stupidest Mobile to PC port over i have ever seen. In the grand scheme of things instead of optimizing the game for PC usage they just re-arrange a few things and slapped 'PC' on the game and that was it. Lol! for the love of god, you have to use a touchscreen monitor in order to play this game no coding for the standard W,A,S,D controls or directional controls. Only mouse and touchscreen.   I won't go into this any further. Check out the screenshots from the community and check the reviews. In fact don't check just don't play this game!

Wow, they are just flagrantly stealing content from a hollywood production... 'Enjoy' this abnomination of a game while it is still here, i dont doubt that it will get taken down for copyright infringment.
THIS IS COPYRIGHT INFRINGEMENT!!!!!

Everything about this game is complete garbage. There is zero originality in terms of graphics and gameplay. The graphics look like rehashed artwork from the mobile game Army of Darkness Defense, which clearly looks to be developed by the same company Back Flip Studios, yet the developer on steam is listed as YFC studios. Definitely the typical watered down mobile tower defense game laden with micro transactions.  Pro's: The client is free.  Con's: Everything in the client.
-8/8 it's not gr8 m8
You know that really crappy flash game you played on Newgrounds a few years back?   Imagine that got a steam release.
copyright infringement.  ever heard of it?

the only thing i like about this game is the music it not good but not Sh!t this game is for IOS so if you have a really ♥♥♥♥♥♥ computer get it plus they need to rename irt Spartans vs skel from a rif something like that NOT ZOMBIES there are no zombies any where
this game makes me actually sad
Why...... , just why would anyone make this game.......
10/10 would ripoff 300 again
Donkey dung. At least 'till keyboard controls and a PRO (non-freem) version get added!
This game is truly a piece of S H I T. Had to install it to to write a review. Uninstalling now. Dont want this to tie up hard drive space.

What is better than a Shity game made with multiple copyright problems and is made for smartphones.... Nothing. This is a very poorly made game based of thge movie 300. I enjoyed it out of humor and not the content. It was fun to play when i had nothing else to do. But really, It is a super bad game and you do the same thing over and over and it just gets harder. It was a great waste of time at 2am. Gameplay 0/10 Humor 11/10 Stupidness 10/10

This is a free to play game that i have not had to purchase anything to get nearly to the end, im about 1 hr off finishing it and its quite a simple fun time sink. It's never going to be GTA V or Skyrim, it a fairly standard side scrolling defence game. Yes it is full of copyrighted material and i am sure the devs will get shot for it, however as a game in the genre that it is it's O.K. :)
Animator went home and got married. 8/8

First of this game is stupid. It is simple and really don't belong here. With that said though It is addictive and at the price of free it is somthing diffrent to take a break with. Other than that it is of little value
GOTY 0 AD - 2015 AD 200/1 IGN WHY DONT YOU OWN THIS IT IS THE BEST STEAMING PILE OF ♥♥♥♥♥ THAT WAS EVER SHATED
I expected nothing and I'm still disappointed.
its a great game to pass the time
good game very fun

The game provides deep strategic gameplay,multiple ways to complete the fun varied levels and last but not least great movie-like voice acting.Story will make you ask yourself life changing questions like 'What is your profession?' and 'Is this madness?'  10/10 hua hua

I like to see a game like this from mobile and i really enjoy this. I mean if you disagree, is it because it came from mobile version? Why dont you just enjoy whats new aye? :3 I mean if you really dont like this game, why would you even download it :P I agree its a terrible game but hey, its f2p and its fun at the same way :)
Ok it is a stupid game. But it's a highly addictive stupid game, so I recommend it. it's not Total War or Civ, but you do need to think - a little- in what upgrades you should proceed.
i switched hardware and lost all progress with big $$$ spent..... hurter
Not worth your time.

This game is just another mobile game that found its way to Steam. Also, the graphics are horrible and I don`t think the developers know what coyright is.   I greatly do not request you download this game. Actually, don`t the 'zombies' look exactly like skeletons? There`s another thing the developers don`t know about. Zombies.
Just play the game. It's free anyway..=)
i enjoyed this game. it was really fun. the story is amazing 10/10. please ad co-op or multiyplayer.
A silly, but fun hack and slash strategy game. It's free, it has 300 looking dudes, and is upgradeable. I say give it a shot.
